column2: Hudson Capital Inc, formerly China Internet Nationwide Financial Services Inc, is a holding company mainly engaged in in the business of providing financial advisory services small-to-medium sized enterprises (SMEs). The Company, through its subsidiaries, offers commercial payment advisory services, international corporate financing advisory services, intermediary bank loan advisory services and factoring services. Commercial payment advisory service provides commercial payment advisory services to its clients. International corporate financing advisory services help its clients obtain financing to support their overseas business development.
